name: Call to action 1
description: Call to action sections are used to encourage users to take an action. This is a vertical call to action section with an action button at the bottom.

strings.description: Main title of the call to action section
Subtitle of the call to action section
Button text of the call to action section

name: Content Columns
description: Content columns are used to provide more detailed information about the product or service. This is a two column content section with an image on the right.

strings.description: A small subtitle that appears on the top of the section, right before the title
Main title of the content section
First paragraph of the content section
Second paragraph of the content section, with larger font size to emphasize the content
Third paragraph of the content section
Fourth paragraph of the content section. It appears on the right side above the image

name: Feature Columns
description: Feature columns are used to highlight the main features of the product or service. This section is a three column grid.

strings.description: Main title of the feature section
Subtitle of the call to feature section
Title of the first feature

name: Hero Centered
description: Hero sections are used to introduce the product or service. They are the first and primary section of the website. This is a centered hero section with a large title, a subtitle and two buttons.

strings.description: Main title of the hero section
Subtitle of the hero section
Primary button text of the hero section
